data.title: True Sage Foundation
data.meta_description: The SAGE Group - The SAGE Group one of the Best Company in India, is a parent firm of Agrawal Construction Co, Sagar Group of Institutions, SAGE University and Agrawal Power
data.text:
True SAGE Foundation, established in 2019, is dedicated to societal and environmental betterment through high moral standards and collective efforts. Led by the Chairperson of the Sage Group, Mrs. Kiran Agrawal, the Foundation provides essentials like food, water, clothing, and education to marginalized communities. It regularly organizes Blood Donation Camps to raise community awareness. Committed to innovative education, the Foundation aims to empower and catalyze change for the nation’s holistic development.

Madhya Pradesh -Bhopal and Indore District taking the best of the support of SAGE Group Presence locations surroundings - SGI, SUB, SUI, SAGE Schools, ACC, ASH – Developing Map (geo locations) based on mapping of SAGE group present geography the most vulnerable Rural and Urban population /villages /slums and other social institutions will be focused to support the various welfare initiatives. Mapping of existing organisations and Govt initiatives in the targeted area – (Smart City, BMC, Education and health programs of Govt. efforts will be made to work in collaboration with Govt. and also strengthening the Govt. schemes and programs.

Our work encompasses several thematic areas, including. Education, Health, Agriculture, and Bio-diversity, as well as Infrastructure Development, Youth and Leadership.
